content:
Hello,
Alpha Release has been created and published.
The updates from the previous release include the following changes:

  1. Updated Eicr Workflow actions to execute according to the PlanDefinition and appropriate scheduled jobs.2
  2. Updated Schematron processing to get validation errors properly.
  3. Updated Direct processing to send messages via Direct.
  4. Updated UI for enabling cloud hosting of the app for multiple clinical sites. Please note that the previous method of configuring using config.js and .env in the frontend directory is no longer required and is not available as everything has been transitioned to the UI.

The README file has been updated accordingly and the app configuration guide is available in the documents folder.
